restless.translation[0].definitions[0].d: unwilling to keep still or stay where you are, especially because you are nervous or bored
restless.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The children had been indoors all day, and were getting restless.
restless.translation[0].definitions[1].d: unwilling to stay in one place, and always wanting new experiences
restless.translation[0].definitions[1].e: After a few weeks in Marseille, I grew restless and decided to move on.
